title: Did Star reality tell Bethany Frankel this about Megan Markle?
subtitle: The Star of Real Housewives in New York tweeted hours before the broadcast of Oprah Winfrey's interview with Harry and Megan.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On the morning of March 7, 2012, hours before CBS aired an interview with Prince Harry, and Megan Markle, the star of reality television Bettney Frankel used Twitter to mock the sympathetic feelings of the Duchess of Sussex.
